desc: Double R Designs offers a wide range of gift items, decals and apparel geared towards the livestock, horse and pet enthusiasts in your life. Key Chains, Mirror Hangers, Mask Clips, Vehicle Vent Clips, Decals, Shirts and more can be found on our website. Browse our pages to find the PERFECT gifts!

layout.text: Unique hand made gifts designed with farmers, ranchers, stock show families and equestrians in mind.
